name: Doran Doran: The Search for the Lost Soul
name_original: Doran Doran: The Search for the Lost Soul
description:
Activate your reflexes, choose the right path, decipher hidden messages, and solve riddles to make your way through the different sub-dimensions of the dream realm.

Doran lost his soul in the process of our so-called “living.” Transported to the dream realm, he’s guided by Sibbie, the wise crow, to help him chase after his wandering soul before it’s all too late! 

Game features:

☆ Different game play and feel per chapter

☆ Probably some life advices for you as a takeaway

Chapters:

☆ Chapter 1: Who Let the Soul Out? (run, jump, avoid the sweepers)

☆ Chapter 2: Ordinary World (strategize, activate the right path, choose wisely)

☆ Chapter 3: Bring Me to Life (decipher hidden messages, pay attention to the clues)

☆ Chapter 4: Counting Stars (solve the riddles to activate your path)

Help Doran retrieve his soul and realize what living was really meant for.

This goes out to all those people who have put so much burden to themselves. You're only you. Learn to accept that.

This is GLUOS Studios' first soulful project. Check my profile to have a quick view of who I am. How did I go? :)
